Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Necklace
Description: A 45 cm long necklace comprised of irregular disc-shaped beads of blue enamel, a central shell, six tubular beads of blue enamel, two oblong beads of green amazonite, two oblong beads of red carnelian, ten round beads of carnelian and two round beads of blue enamel.
